page.title: 18W.CHILTINGTON ATTITUDES
page.content: In our survey of adults and children we asked them what they liked and did not like about living in W.Chilt.Boys and girls and grown ups too all chose the{peacefulness}and the{countryside as the most important things. There are so many trees and large gardens in the village and fields and farms near by.The children also liked living here because their{friends}were near them. Few of the girls could think of any- thing that they didn't like.Some would like{more clubs}others didn't like the {farm smells!}The boys wanted more {clubs}and{shops}but{less school! The adults were asked what they would most like to change. Most mums said {'nothing'}others wanted{no more houses {better bus service}and{more activities for children.The dads added,{fewer new {comers,better paths,roads and village {hall}and everyone to have a{bathroom!
